attributes.action: Northern Ireland War Memorial, and Wording
attributes.additional_details:
Northern Ireland Veterans are asking for a dedicated War memorial to represent the War dead of 1500, this Memorial is long overdue.
We are also asking the Government to change the word Troubles to War, since the ceasefire there has been a war on terror, but what makes the war in N.I any different, there was nothing troubling about it when we served.
Changing the word troubles to War will give some respect to the fallen, it will mean they died doing their duty and also will give it some credence, so please help me to change the Governments stance on this.
